description:
Satsuki Amamiya, a member of the Photography Club, finds herself in a slump as her beloved club president graduates from high school. Her best friend, An Kiriyama, cheers her up, reigniting Satsuki`s motivation to give the club her best again. But the 360-degree camera Satsuki bought at an online auction hasn`t arrived yet! Satsuki and An pay the seller a visit.
Source: Crunchyroll
